name: paginator
description: The Paginator utility allows you to display an item or a group of items depending on the number of items you wish to display at one time. This allows you to increase your applicatoin response time by displaying a limited number of items for easy viewing and giving the user the ability to request additional items when they are ready.
author: apipkin

examples.name: slideshow
examples.description: This example illustrates how to create a slideshow using paginator to control the slides.

examples.name: table
examples.description: An HTML table containing 50 states and their population with an attached paginator to view the information in small sections.

examples.name: search
examples.description: An application using the Flickr API to display images with a paginator control to step through the results.
